title: Western style font
content:
Hi,  
does anyone recognize this font? I have seen it before, but I don't remember when and where...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/10003947_508326725964411_7321235843710425769_n_4486.png)

Font: 

 SD Grunge Serifia 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112529/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Grey Delacroix

comments.content: **[SD Grunge Serifia (Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112529/http:/synergydigital.deviantart.com/art/SD-Grunge-Serifia-Font-93046795)** free font from Synergy Digital Media [2008] (including the decoration)
